thread.title: Kotoko assistant coach Michael Osei starts refresher programme at Bundesliga II side FSV Franfurt
thread.title_full: Kotoko assistant coach Michael Osei starts refresher programme at Bundesliga II side FSV Franfurt

title: Kotoko assistant coach Michael Osei starts refresher programme at Bundesliga II side FSV Franfurt
text:
22:40 CET Kotoko assistant coach Michael Osei starts refresher programme at Bundesliga II side FSV Franfurt - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Asante Kotoko assistant coach Michael Osei is at German Bundesliga II side FSV Frankfurt for for a refresher programme. 
Osei is expected to spend three weeks before returning to Kotoko, where his future is in doubt, for pre-season training ahead of the 2015/16 season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us I feel like when people judge me they're not judging me, because they don't know who I am. By: Skipper Young
